revised_title: The Enamel Structure and Development in Elasmobranch Fishes
tldr: The author investigates the structure and development of enamel in elasmobranch fish teeth, revealing differences in enamel thickness and structure between various species. The study also examines the relationship between dentine and enamel, as well as the presence of dentinal tubes in the enamel, which play a role in the tooth's overall function.
